p: Hemogram: leukopenia especially lymphopenia (in 80% of cases), mild thrombocytopenia. However, leukocytosis has also been reported [ 13, 17]. Some researchers suggested neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio (NLR) as an independent risk factor for severe illness and NLR ≥ 3.13 was considered as threshold for progression to severe illness in COVID-19 patients.
